title: More computers from South Korea decreases US Xn

content.question: Which of the following would decrease the United States net exports to South Korea?

choices.label: South Korean computer companies sell more computers to the United States.
South Korean insurance companies provide fewer services to the United States.
South Koreans spend more vacations in the United States.
United States banks provide more banking services to South Korea.
United States smartphone companies sell more smartphones to South Korea.

content.answer: South Korean computer companies sell more computers to the United States.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
